attributes.action: Scrap the Public Duty Costs Allowance for Liz Truss!
attributes.additional_details: It's an absolute disgrace that Liz Truss should get the Public Duty Costs Allowance for holding the role of Prime Minister for 45 days.
attributes.background: Put a stop to former Prime Ministers getting the Public Duty Costs Allowance for life unless they serve their country for a minimum of 2 years.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals, but you may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626127
